document.full_text: police searching on long island for victims of a suspected serial killer said on tuesday they identified two more sets on human remains, bringing the number of bodies possibly up to as many as ten.
document.title: police identify remains as human in serial killer hunt
lines_and_colors: police searching on long island for victims of a suspected serial killer said on tuesday they identified two more sets on human remains, bringing the number of bodies possibly up to as many as ten.
